website_summaries.verdict: Combining the timeless design of a cleat with the function and comfort of a sneaker, the Timberland Adventure Cupsole Chukka readies the wearer for any journey. It offers value for the money at $120, providing support and durability.Reviewers have pointed out that the sneaker is attractive and fits true to size. They receive compliments from others due to the shoe’s head-turning style. However, a few buyers have remarked that it has to be broken in first due to its initial tight fit.
pros: The Timberland Adventure Cupsole Chukka is an affordable sneaker
Many testers love the look of the shoe, calling it attractive and sporty
It fits true to size, most reviewers confirm
A couple of wearers observe that the Timberland Adventure Cupsole Chukka keeps their feet dry
The sneaker fits very comfortably, a lot of commenters attest
Most buyers say that they can recommend the shoe to others
A few users like the Timberland Adventure Cupsole Chukka so much that they have multiple pairs
There are several colorways released for the model
The kicks offer a high level of quality that a lot of reviewers have come to expect of Timberland sneakers
Some testers share that they get compliments every time they wear the Timberland Adventure Cupsole Chukka
cons: A few testers remark that the model needs to broken in first as the fit is initially tight

customer_reviews.title: Weak bottom of a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 winter seasons and over 1000 km walking on the concrete paths. Top holds very well without any issues, water does not go through. However after so many kilometers on those shoes the bottom basically started to have a hole in it. Overall comfortable to walk a lot with it. Great shoes normal person won't walk that much. Would certainly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes, great for winter walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes primarily for the winter. It's no fun walking around in the rain/snow with soggy feet. These do a perfect job of keeping the water out and your feet dry! The only thing I would say is the lace on them lasted about 6 months for me before they tore while I was tying them, but it's cheap and easy to buy replacements.
customer_reviews.author: mooo

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes... Would've been 5 stars if they came with normal timberland laces and not those crappy rawhide laces.. Also like all timberland boots they're slightly bigger; my trainers size is 10.5 so I had to buy size 10 to fit me
customer_reviews.author: Yemi

customer_reviews.title: Great smart trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. Not a big fan of buying shoes online as you never know how they look/fit but these are great. Smarter than a pair of trainers but not smart shoes so they have quickly become my 'go to' shoes. The big test is how they hold up over the next 6 month's. My other timberlands have lasted years so I hope these are made to silimar standards but time will tell. So far they do feel solid though. Maybe an indication of my fashion skills these days but I just ordered a second pair in another colour. Delivery was quick and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wear out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, they look good and are very comfortable. Unfortunately after 6 months undemanding wear they are wearing out. The Timberland labels on the back of the sole fell off months ago and now it feels like I am going to wear through the sole very soon as the tread has disappeared and you can see the lining underneath coming though. Disappointing for Timberland as in the past I have had many years use from their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: I’m
customer_reviews.text: It’s just my personal opinion: I’m usually size 9, so I ordered size 9. Slightly larger than my size, heavy, laces worn off quickly and tore in a few months time, not too comfy, etc. The list of negatives is too long but I think you get the point. The only positive: looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Too big, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are too big. I'm size 9 and rarely have a problem with shoes fitting, but these are uncomfortably large. Furthermore I'm not convinced they're that good quality, the soles feel week and flexible and I doubt they'll last very long. Wouldn't recommend these I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: PBarke

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: saw these in Office in York when out shopping for new shoes. Glad they didn't have my size as i bought them from Amazon for £30 less than the retail price at Office! Great shoes and worn daily. Good fit and durable as well as looking good in casuals.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable straight away, look great, and really nice to walk in. Everything I was looking for. If you apply some wax to them (I bought some for about £6 from Timberland) they'll not scuff so much, deepen in colour and soften them a little. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Hitchplop

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots, but they do get dirty
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots but I would recommend using a protector spray regularly. They are bar far the most comfortable boots I have had and even compare well against trainers. They look great too, but need regular cleaning and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Cai

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality but comfy enough!
customer_reviews.text: Decent sized toecap for us fat foots! Get worn far too easy though. Not bad for dossing around in.
customer_reviews.author: elstevador

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes, but make sure you get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, and feels like good quality. They go really well with jeans. But I would not recommend if you do a lot of walking in them but this may be because the size 9 was slightly bigger then i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aurangzeb

customer_reviews.title: Great till they died
customer_reviews.text: All was great, not worn these much but on a three day vacation they split and I am told they cannot be repaired, obviously a manufacturing error very disappointed as should be long lasting great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Damo

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, reasonable price as well. Timberlands always last for ages and stay comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of boots but the laces don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable: I took them to Norway on holiday because I thought they'd be comfy, stylish and waterproof, and they were all three. However, the laces didn't last, which was disappointing. Timberland do need to address this. They are spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Macfarlane

customer_reviews.title: Yep, like 'em
customer_reviews.text: Colour pretty much as the pic and fortunately the "patch" on the tongue doesn't contrast as much as it looks. Nice looking shoes in the khaki. I'm a UK 12 and the 11.5 fits nicely without being too "boaty"
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: overall very comfortable fit according to my
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. The sole wore down within a year but the seller replaced the shoes and I returned the original pair. Hope these do not end the same way as the first pair.....overall very comfortable fit according to my son
customer_reviews.author: foxy

customer_reviews.title: No wearing in needed
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes for a couple of months now . Used every day whilst walking the dog. Really comfortable and waterproof. Slight problem that I wonder whether they're wearing out rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Delli

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit darker than in the pic but I prefer that. Nice comfortable boots, great for walking etc but also look good in a pair of jeans. Get them for £63 while you can because the exact ones on the timberland site are £110
customer_reviews.author: Crossmeister

customer_reviews.title: good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes had minor stained look at one of heels but expected with this material. Box arrived with hole through top but shoes fit well and comfy. Excellent price (£75) as cheapest i seen these shopping was £100-105. May be worth orderinghalf size smaller then your trainer size as they are slightly more roomy.
customer_reviews.author: daza

customer_reviews.title: Boots are awesome. I have had them for 12 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots are awesome. I have had them for 12 months and they are holding up well. Snapped a leather shoelace but that is to be expected with regular wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor quality soles
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but soles wear through too quickly. After just 4 months of casual wear, unacceptable for a brand renowned for quality at a premium price.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smart and or casual
customer_reviews.text: Perfect smart and or casual, matches most if not all attire. Bought specifically as smart shoes for clubbing, worn twice and have held up remarkably. I have a similar pair in a lighter colour, they're the reason I bought these because I like the style of shoe so much, but because they are a lighter colour they scuff more easily. Would reccomend especially for the reduced price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour (Olive but no more of a dark brown). Timberland quality and bargain price. Have immediately changed the leather laces as I don't think they will last long, in line with several comments here to that effect.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: These fit absolutely perfectly and was so glad they come in half sizes
customer_reviews.text: These fit absolutely perfectly and was so glad they come in half sizes. It is a very well made pair of shoes that look as though they will last a long time. They are very comfortable and arrived the following day. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: Naice
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy shoes thanks to anti fatigue lining, walked for miles to and from work and never had so much as an ache from them. Will say though try to avoid getting them wet, the outer material darkens and can only be restored by cleaning them with a nubuck kit. Even so - they get better with age I think and more comfortable too. Really happy with them though and very sturdy for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Constantinou

customer_reviews.title: Timberland. Boot heaven.
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable shoe which makes all the difference. Feet feel warm and safe from any element that can be thrown at you. It's my third pair of those. I will be coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Thrillog

customer_reviews.title: comfortable on the foot and nice and warm in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable on the foot and nice and warm in the winter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Was a present & they loved them. I don’t think the material was great personally for timberlands, after a year they’ve very much deteriorated.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me fit wise.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as these looked great but just didn't fit me at all well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dore

customer_reviews.title: MUST WEAR THICK SOCKS
customer_reviews.text: I didn't wear the correct socks and now have permanent scars on the back of my heels from damage from the blisters, so make sure to wear thick socks. They look really nice and are comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: RoadHog

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable, well made shoe that looks good with trousers ...
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable, well made shoe that looks good with trousers or jeans. Minor point to note is that my pair were supplied only with the leather laces not the with additional 'timberland yellow' laces as I've received with other pairs I've ordered.
customer_reviews.author: The Grubber

customer_reviews.title: The shoes seem great, fitting as expected and really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seem great, fitting as expected and really comfortable. However, I should say they didn't arrive in the best condition possible.
customer_reviews.author: rmvt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and receiver loved them and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jamie-Lee Meiklejohn

customer_reviews.title: mint top quality darker color look even better
customer_reviews.text: very nice mint quality slightly darker and look better i wanted this color so read reviews about different color payed off. laces wont last long not very nice but doesnt bother me. very happy a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Troy Anthony Woodlock

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: A great spin off for Timberland. Such a smart development of the classic boot. Much softer and pliable and more comfortable...looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunatelly didn't enjoy for long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in May 2015. Unfortunatelly didn't enjoy for long. After a month feature leather laces got torn. But most importantly, recently a hole developed in the leather close to where it meets the sole. For expensive shoes I expected them to last at least a year, especially coming from Timberland which is known for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... they are bit darker than a thought but really nice so happy n came really fast to
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift for my partner n they are bit darker than a thought but really nice so happy n came really fast to
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and excellent quality as you would expect from timberland
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a birthday present and he lives in them. Very comfortable and excellent quality as you would expect from timberland
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Look great, slightly narrow fit but fine after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Look great, slightly narrow fit but fine after a couple of wears. Lost a star for the leather laces - they look great and work well, but unlike on deck shoes where they tend to remain tied all the time, these need loosening and tightening all the time. I'm sure I'll have to replace them soon with regular laces.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with these shoes. But those silly leather laces snapped, forcing the purchase of proper laces. Could be that these shoes are old and the laces may have somewhat perished.
customer_reviews.author: A. ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've ever bought. The lace will snap as soon as you touch the damn thing but a waxed shoelace to replace is all you need for a few quid. They've lasted ages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: My Timberlands are amazing comfort from day one right away ,they make you feel like your walking on AIR. Iplan to get another colour ASAP i am totallt happy in every way with my TIMBERLANDS
customer_reviews.author: Primitive

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, poor quality. After 6 months they started falling apart. Souls split exactly like the other commenters have said. Logo on the back fell off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Courtman

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but too high expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting amazing things. Maybe too much expectations, after the first walk outside I damaged the heel a little bit and the leather laces are not good, I was waiting the good Timberland laces not the leather ones. The shoes are good but I was imagining something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love them these are my 2nd pair. Great felling wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Boots are great and they are looking fine
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great and they are looking fine. Little bit smaller than expected but no problem to wear them. I will not write anything else because I still need to test them :) :) Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase on Amazon. What can I say... A great pair of shoes, at a fantastic price and delivered in perfect time (despite I live in South Italy). It's not a dream, it's only Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eg86

customer_reviews.title: ... so marks as you would expect but looks quite nice with scuffs
customer_reviews.text: Nubuck material so marks as you would expect but looks quite nice with scuffs. Fits well. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barnes

customer_reviews.title: A really nice shoe fits great but the laces are very long ...
customer_reviews.text: A really nice shoe fits great but the laces are very long and get softer as you tie them but are leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality boot. Leather really soft. I am a UK size 9 and they fitted perfectly. Nice and comfortable and look good. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rickyroogar

customer_reviews.title: Accept no Substitute!!
customer_reviews.text: Precisely as described, what I wanted, delivered extremely quickly excellent quality as expected. End of!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gee

customer_reviews.title: Really good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoes and much cheaper than buying it on the high street. The delivery was very fast and the shoes are very roomy and comfortable which is what I was looking for. The only complaint I have is the leather laces as they tend to become undone often.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, really comfortable, a little pricey for something not very practical but great addition to my foot wear collection!
customer_reviews.author: malcolm mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time I bought these. And the first time was more than two years ago. Says enough ...right?
customer_reviews.author: All About Health

customer_reviews.title: the 44 EUR is slightly larger to me,
customer_reviews.text: the 44 EUR is slightly larger to me, probably it may worth consider to buy half a number smaller next time
customer_reviews.author: vito carrescia

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Since I happily own another version of this shoe, I was confident that everything would be okay with this shipment and it was.
customer_reviews.author: Anders Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Timberland boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very light and comfortable .you get quality for your money with Timberland!
customer_reviews.author: Alan M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes, they fit well and they're confortable. I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: There scratched on the back of the boot not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt even leave a star but u have no choise.......There scratched on the back of the boot not very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timberlands
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Timberlands boots, a Christmas gift for my Grandson. He was very pleased, fit and quality good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking boots could be doing with a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: david potter

customer_reviews.title: What a pair of Shoes! So comfotable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect fit and so comfortable and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thornton-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, the lace is very personal, and now I wear every day
customer_reviews.author: Huang Jinyan

customer_reviews.title: Happy !
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes/ boots! Would recommend only thing is slightly different colour to the picture but not far off but overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Early days but so for so good - comfort is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mr K T McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: brought these for my partner and he loves them, very comfatable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another perfect Timberland product. Very happy with purchase, EXCELENT price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.J.B

customer_reviews.title: fitted great
customer_reviews.text: Looked very on trend, very comfortable, loved the leather laces too
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot, but beware of colour!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot, but beware that the actual colour is a much darker brown than shown here. (More of a chocolate)
customer_reviews.author: hornchurch1

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sole failed in 6 months time. Rather bad/unexpected for timberland shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fotis S

customer_reviews.title: Timberland earth shoes
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfortable shoes. Like walking on Flubber. Good look. Very well made. Good quality. Great, great. I do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Hud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing, came on time and was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Smith

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really great product fit perfectly I'm usually size 7 but ordered 6.5 which was perfect. Looks very smart so much so I just ordered another one in blue!
customer_reviews.author: ermias

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend ordering a half size up from your usual size ...
customer_reviews.text: Timberland seem to come up slightly small which I was aware of so they fit me perfectly. I would recommend ordering a half size up from your usual size to avoid disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good despatch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quick despatch, box was a little battered on arrival & a corner was torn, boots were in good condition, but didnt 100% brand new, looked a little worn/ off white.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent really love wearing them so comfy and look great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent really love wearing them so comfy and look great thanks
customer_reviews.author: edward harte

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, only down point is the laces as they aren't the best. I would advise buying a higher quality pair of laces. Apart from that little issue the boots are very nice 👍
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Clark

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Such quick delivery I was amazed. The shoes are lovely and exactly as they were described.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte gailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fits perfectly, only complaint is the laces and I can replace them easy enough with some proper Timberland ones
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 10 UK Fit as expected. The shoes have some aesthetic defects
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is really happy with these. Very comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: chwitt

customer_reviews.title: ... given 5 stars if the color wasn't fading that easily. It look good on me
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars if the color wasn't fading that easily. It look good on me...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting boots, really easy to break in. Came just in time for the cold snap, been wearing them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected and some nice warm trainers for the bad weather!
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots, slightly larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boots, slightly larger than expected, but an insole has made them just right. Note, takes some time for them to soften up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected and they look as description, also delivery quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel comfortable & look great. Excellent price as still full price in the shops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with them straight on very comfortable walked miles
customer_reviews.author: a clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality not good. Just wear a week, there is a obvious abrasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Comfortable an durable.... Second pair of these I've purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Amato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a more comfortable fit & feel than these!
customer_reviews.author: a j streeter

customer_reviews.title: Happy earthkeeper
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking boot. Fits well, very comfortable and overall I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery no problems at all very generous on the size wide fitting boot
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J Lawton

customer_reviews.title: chukka timberland
customer_reviews.text: fitted a little tight to start with but after use brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Colour, Still Good....
customer_reviews.text: As per an earlier review below (they've also posted pictures) - they are NOT the colour advertised. They're darker, and the box itself has a different colour description to what I ordered. Still, I'm not fussy so I'll keep them but I'm sure some would be annoyed with the colour discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K

customer_reviews.title: Timberland Earthkeeper Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are top quality shoes and for the price can't complain at all. They are slightly darker than advertised as other reviews have pointed out, so if you are looking for the exact colour In the photographs then I would go elsewhere. In terms of size, they do come up fairly large, I am a size 12 and went for the 11.5 and they are plenty big enough. All in all a sound purchase for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Dan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these boots. Arrived before the quoted time, and are really well made. Always been happy with Timberland products, and these are no exception. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bassguy

customer_reviews.title: Very very stylish! You can't go wrong with these boots!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely fit and colour. These shoes lovely very impressive and stylish. Having read other reviews I can confirm that those shoes come with minor scratches and marks in the leather however they are not too visible. Shoes fit as expected. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Edge

customer_reviews.title: Boots are great, just a shame that the order I placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great, just a shame that the order I placed was for Brown/Wheat & I recieved red/Brown, can't be bothered with the hassle of returning the item, great boots, just a shame the attention to detail wasn't on par!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Timberland Earthkeepers Adventure Cupsole, Men's Chukka Boots
